00029 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00030 #  include "config.h"

00033 #include "selection.h"
00034 
00035 wxMBConv *CharsetConvert = &wxConvUTF8;
00036 #define UTF8_STR(s) (wxString(s, *CharsetConvert))
00037 
00038 Selection::Selection()
00039 {
00040         UTF8_STRING_Atom = COMPOUND_TEXT_Atom = GDK_NONE;
00041         IsBusy = 0;
00042         selection_widget = NULL;
00043         timeout = 0;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void Selection::create_selection_widget()
00047 {
00048         if (selection_widget)
00049                 gtk_widget_destroy(selection_widget);
00050         selection_widget = gtk_invisible_new ();
00051         g_signal_connect (G_OBJECT (selection_widget), "selection_received", G_CALLBACK (SelectionReceivedCallback), this);
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 void Selection::Init()
00056 {
00057         UTF8_STRING_Atom = gdk_atom_intern("UTF8_STRING",false);
00058         COMPOUND_TEXT_Atom = gdk_atom_intern("COMPOUND_TEXT",false);
00059 
00060         create_selection_widget();
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Selection::End()
00064 {
00065         stop();
00066         if (selection_widget)
00067                 gtk_widget_destroy(selection_widget);
00068 }
00069 
00070 void Selection::start()
00071 {
00072         if (!timeout)
00073                 timeout = g_timeout_add(SELECTION_INTERVAL,TimeOutCallback,this);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void Selection::stop()
00077 {
00078         if (timeout) {
00079                 g_source_remove(timeout);
00080                 timeout = 0;
00081         }
00082         LastClipWord.clear();
00083 }
00084 
00085 gint Selection::TimeOutCallback(gpointer data)
00086 {
00087   Selection *oSelection = (Selection *)data;
00088   
00089     if (oSelection->IsBusy) {
00090       oSelection->IsBusy++;
00091       if (oSelection->IsBusy*SELECTION_INTERVAL > 8000 ) {
00092                         //"selection_received" signal is not received for 8 seconds.
00093                         //there encounter some error,and i find that this often take a long time (serveral minutes) to get the signal at last,
00094                         //during this perioed,if you call gtk_selection_convert(),the "selection_received" signal will not be received also,
00095                         //and at last these signals are received at almost the same time...BAD.
00096                         //so here create a new selection_widget, then call gtk_selection_convert(). this should can throw that 
00097                         //error selection.
00099                         //But this seems(i am not sure) will make the widgets in StarDict become unselectable! see BUGS.
00100                                 g_warning("Error, selection data didn't received, retring!\n");
00101                                 oSelection->create_selection_widget();
00102                                 oSelection->IsBusy = 0;
00103       }
00104     } else {
00105       oSelection->IsBusy = 1;
00106       gtk_selection_convert (oSelection->selection_widget, GDK_SELECTION_PRIMARY, oSelection->UTF8_STRING_Atom, GDK_CURRENT_TIME);
00107     }
00108 
00109   return true;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void Selection::SelectionReceivedCallback(GtkWidget* widget,GtkSelectionData *selection_data, guint time, Selection *oSelection)
00113 {       
00114         gchar *result;
00115         result = (gchar *)gtk_selection_data_get_text (selection_data);
00116         if (!result) {
00117                 /* If we asked for UTF8 and didn't get it, try compound_text;
00118                 * if we asked for compound_text and didn't get it, try string;
00119                 * If we asked for anything else and didn't get it, give up.
00120                 */
00121                 if (selection_data->target == oSelection->UTF8_STRING_Atom) {
00122                         gtk_selection_convert (widget, GDK_SELECTION_PRIMARY, oSelection->COMPOUND_TEXT_Atom, GDK_CURRENT_TIME);
00123                 }
00124                 else if (selection_data->target == oSelection->COMPOUND_TEXT_Atom)
00125                 {
00126                         gtk_selection_convert (widget, GDK_SELECTION_PRIMARY, GDK_TARGET_STRING, GDK_CURRENT_TIME);
00127                 }
00128                 else {
00129                         oSelection->IsBusy = 0;
00130                         oSelection->LastClipWord.clear();
00131                 }
00132                 return;
00133     }
00134         oSelection->IsBusy = 0;
00135 
00136         oSelection->SelectionReceived(result);  
00137         g_free (result);
00138 }
00139 
00140 void Selection::SelectionReceived(char* sToken)
00141 {
00142     if(sToken[0] == '\0') {
00143         LastClipWord.clear();
00144         return;
00145     }
00146 
00147         gint len = 0;
00148         gchar *a = sToken;
00149         while ((*a) && len < 256) {
00150                 a = g_utf8_next_char (a);
00151                 ++len;
00152         }
00153         *a = '\0';
00154         
00155     while (g_ascii_isspace(*sToken))
00156                 sToken++;
00157         if(sToken[0] == '\0') {
00158                 LastClipWord.clear();
00159         return;
00160     }
00161 
00162         a=strchr(sToken,'\n');
00163         if (a)
00164                 *a='\0';
00165 
00166      if (LastClipWord != sToken){
00167         LastClipWord = sToken;
00168         wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00169         pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
00170         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Temp-String"), UTF8_STR(sToken));
00171         delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);
00172         //DEBUGGING
00173         //fprintf(stderr, "Selection Received:%s\n", compStr);  
00174      }
00175 }
